name: USCoreBirthSexExtension
title: US Core Birth Sex Extension
description: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth  as specified by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)](https://www.healthit.gov/newsroom/about-onc). This extension aligns with the C-CDA Birth Sex Observation (LOINC 76689-9). After version 6.0.0, this extension is no longer a *USCDI Requirement*.

element.definition: A code classifying the person's sex assigned at birth  as specified by the [Office of the National Coordinator for Health IT (ONC)](https://www.healthit.gov/newsroom/about-onc).
element.comment: The codes required are intended to present birth sex (i.e., the sex recorded on the patient's birth certificate) and not gender identity or reassigned sex.

binding.description: Code for sex assigned at birth
